But will it give her the power to save a previous herd of white horses? Family drama, starring Lucy Morton, Thekla Reuten, Fiona Glascott, Lorcan Cranitch and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid.(n)

programme.title: Ghosthunters: On Icy Trails
programme.desc: A fearful young boy forms an unlikely bond with a loveable green ghost and tries to help him reclaim his haunted house. Family adventure, starring Anke Engelke, Milo Parker and the voice of Bastian Pastewka.(n)

programme.title: Dr Dolittle 3
programme.desc: The talented vet's daughter with the same uncanny ability to talk to animals is staying at a ranch. When she learns financial problems will force the place to close, she comes up with an ingenious idea to solve the crisis by training the livestock for a rodeo and winning $50,000. Comedy sequel, starring Kyla Pratt, Kristen Wilson and John Amos.(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: A slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer succeeds the British throne when a freak accident wipes out the entire royal family. A loyal aristocrat desperately tries to stop the loud-mouthed American unwittingly bringing the monarchy into disrepute, while a scheming lord plots to make his reign a short one. Comedy, starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole, John Hurt and Richard Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: A megalomaniac threatens to take over the world, so two married spies come out of retirement to thwart his plans. However, when they go missing, it is up to their plucky children to step in and save the day. Family adventure directed by Robert Rodriguez, starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four city friends look forward to a weekend canoeing trip in America's Deep South. However, their adventure turns into a nightmare when menacing rednecks come down from the nearby hills and subject them to a shocking assault, forcing the men to take extreme action to save their lives. John Boorman's thriller based on James Dickey's novel, with Burt Reynolds, Jon Voight, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty and Bill McKinney.

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two 10-year-old boys find a seemingly abandoned police car in a glade and decide to take it for a joyride. However, the obsessive local sheriff is prepared to go to any lengths to get the vehicle back, and the youngsters find themselves drawn into a deadly game of cat and mouse. Crime thriller, starring Kevin Bacon and Camryn Manheim.

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow.

programme.title: Camino
programme.desc: A photographer ventures deep into the jungles of Colombia to document a group of missionaries. However, when she witnesses the leader of the group committing a horrific crime, she faces a battle for survival to make it back to civilisation with the evidence before his followers have her killed. Action thriller, starring Zoe Bell and Nacho Vigalondo.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five successful married men rent an apartment where they can carry out their extra-marital affairs in secret. The arrangement works well until they find the corpse of a beautiful woman handcuffed to a bed - but which of them is the killer, and how will the grisly discovery affect their friendship? Thriller, with Karl Urban, James Marsden and Wentworth Miller.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman.

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.(n)

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta.(n)

programme.title: Unconscious
programme.desc: A man suffering from memory loss begins to suspect that the woman claiming to be his wife is a complete stranger. To make matters worse, he uncovers evidence of more lies and deceit - and becomes trapped inside his own home. Horror, starring Wes Bentley and Kate Bosworth.(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Will the youngster prove to be a chip off the old block by proving useful during a battle against a twisted, hi-tech genius? Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.(n)

programme.title: Standoff
programme.desc: A troubled former soldier who is haunted by his past actions comes to the aid of a 12-year-old girl who has witnessed a murder. He vows to protect her from the assassin pursuing her, but is forced to use unconventional methods to keep the killer at bay when he realises his gun only has one bullet. Thriller, starring Thomas Jane and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Will the youngster prove to be a chip off the old block by proving useful during a battle against a twisted, hi-tech genius? Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk and his crew hijack the decommissioned Enterprise to recover the body of their fallen comrade Mr Spock from the planet Genesis. Kirk has learnt that Spock's spirit is still alive, and the Vulcan can be resurrected, but he must also battle a Klingon captain determined to control the planet's mysterious energy. Sci-fi sequel, directed by Leonard Nimoy, with William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Christopher Lloyd.

programme.title: White Noise: The Light
programme.desc: A man tries to commit suicide following the murder of his family. Although close to death, he is revived and discovers he now has the ability to predict when others are about to die. Using his new-found psychic skill to save lives, he learns too late the dire and unforeseen consequences of his well-intentioned meddling. Horror, starring Nathan Fillion and Katee Sackhoff.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The Starship Enterprise races to the rescue of intergalactic ambassadors held hostage on a distant planet. The crisis proves to be the handiwork of a renegade Vulcan mystic who kidnaps Captain Kirk and his crew, ordering them to fly to an unexplored world where he hopes to fulfil his insane ambition - to meet God. Sci-fi adventure, written, directed by and starring William Shatner, with Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and David Warner.

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.desc: Captain Kirk is framed for the assassination of the Klingon head of state just as the Federation is about to make peace with their old enemies. As Kirk and Dr McCoy are banished to an icy prison planet, Spock tries to uncover the identity of the real killers. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, Christopher Plummer, with appearances by Christian Slater and Michael Dorn from Star Trek: The Next Generation.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Minutes before boarding a rollercoaster with her friends, a high-school graduate has a premonition they will all die and persuades them to get off the ride - just before it crashes. However, death seems intent on catching up with them, as one by one they meet a gruesome end. Horror sequel, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson and Sam Easton.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A retired police detective and his family break down taking a short cut on a remote road and later find themselves attacked by savage and deformed victims of a nuclear testing project. Remake of the 1970s horror, starring Kathleen Quinlan, Aaron Stanford, Vinessa Shaw, Ted Levine, Emilie de Ravin and Dan Byrd.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes 2
programme.desc: National Guard recruits on a training mission in the desert respond to a distress call from an isolated research camp. Finding the outpost abandoned, the soldiers investigate the fate of the scientists who were working there - only to stumble into the clutches of a band of mutant cannibals. Sequel to the remake of the cult horror movie, starring Michael McMillian and Jessica Stroup.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Minutes before boarding a rollercoaster with her friends, a high-school graduate has a premonition they will all die and persuades them to get off the ride - just before it crashes. However, death seems intent on catching up with them, as one by one they meet a gruesome end. Horror sequel, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson and Sam Easton.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The Starship Enterprise races to the rescue of intergalactic ambassadors held hostage on a distant planet. The crisis proves to be the handiwork of a renegade Vulcan mystic who kidnaps Captain Kirk and his crew, ordering them to fly to an unexplored world where he hopes to fulfil his insane ambition - to meet God. Sci-fi adventure, written, directed by and starring William Shatner, with Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and David Warner.

programme.title: Android
programme.desc: A reclusive robotics expert shuts himself away from the world working on a secret project for years. He invites a science journalist to observe the fruits of his labours - an android capable of human emotion. However, they discover the machine has a dangerous side to its nature. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Webber and Lucy Griffiths.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: In a world controlled by a robots, the human population is constantly monitored and is unable to venture outside. However, a boy manages to turn off his personal surveillance device, enabling him to begin a search for his long-lost father, who may hold the key to saving humanity. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson and Callan McAuliffe.

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his `mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: In a world controlled by a robots, the human population is constantly monitored and is unable to venture outside. However, a boy manages to turn off his personal surveillance device, enabling him to begin a search for his long-lost father, who may hold the key to saving humanity. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson and Callan McAuliffe.

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his `mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary young woman discovers she is the Queen of the Earth, and has the power to save it from destruction. With an alien warrior at her side, she sets about protecting the planet from an evil overlord. Sci-fi adventure, starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: Android
programme.desc: A reclusive robotics expert shuts himself away from the world working on a secret project for years. He invites a science journalist to observe the fruits of his labours - an android capable of human emotion. However, they discover the machine has a dangerous side to its nature. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Webber and Lucy Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: Former alien abductees fight fellow victims of extraterrestrial attacks who have been brainwashed into taking over the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Christopher Meloni, Marcia Cross and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Extinction: Jurassic Predators
programme.desc: A scientific expedition into the Amazon makes a remarkable discovery - an unexplored area of jungle where dinosaurs still exist. The explorers may not have a chance to make their discovery known, as the prehistoric beasts include several deadly predators whose hunting ground they have unwittingly entered. Fantasy adventure, starring Sarah Mac and Ben Loyd-Holmes.(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: A Tale of Love and Darkness
programme.desc: Historical drama based on the memoir of acclaimed writer Amos Oz, exploring the founding of the state of Israel and a young writer's relationship with his mother. Written, directed by and starring Natalie Portman, with Shira Haas.

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza.

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.

programme.title: Battle for Sevastopol
programme.desc: A female Russian student becomes an expert sniper during the Second World War, regarded as a hero by her own people and a deadly threat by the German high command. In the later years of the war, she travels to the US, befriending Eleanor Roosevelt and spearheading a campaign to persuade America to join the Allies. Fact-based drama, starring Yuliya Peresild and Evgeniy Tsyganov. In Russian and English.

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: During a freezing cold winter in the frozen woods of an isolated Maine logging town, a lapse of concentration has devastating consequences for a school bus driver. Drama, starring Amy Morton, John Slattery and Louisa Krause.

programme.title: The Forgotten Kingdom
programme.desc: A young man reluctantly embarks on a journey to his ancestral land of Lesotho to bury his estranged father, and finds himself drawn to the mystical beauty and hardships of the people and the land he had forgotten. Drama, starring Zenzo Ngqobe, Nozipho Nkelemba and Lebohang Ntsane. In Southern Sotho.

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton.

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: In a future run by a genetically enhanced elite, a caretaker who was born unmodified is barred from all but the most menial jobs. He swaps identities with a former athlete who has lost the use of his legs in an accident, allowing him to realise his dream of joining the space programme. However, a murder investigation threatens to expose his deception. Sci-fi drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman and Jude Law.

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Ma Ma
programme.desc: A single mum finds meaning in new friendships as her treatment for breast cancer intensifies. Spanish drama, starring Penelope Cruz.

programme.title: A Clockwork Orange
programme.desc: Sadistic young gang leader Alex leads a carefree life indulging his love of rape, violence and classical music. When he is finally arrested, he is subjected to a sinister form of aversion therapy that brainwashes him into being physically unable to use violence. However, on his release, he finds friends and family have turned on him, while others seek to exploit him to further their political ends. Drama, starring Malcolm McDowell and Warren Clarke.

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician.

programme.title: Northwest
programme.desc: A teenage burglar uses his ill-gotten gains to support his mother and younger brother. Longing for a more profitable line of work, he gets involved with a gangster, but soon he and his sibling are in over their heads as they are drawn into a world of drugs and prostitution. Crime drama, starring real-life brothers Gustav and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese. In Danish.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: A man finds himself living on the streets as his health deteriorates, leaving him with nowhere to turn. He tries to find a place in a shelter where he befriends another homeless man, who supports and advises him in an attempt to put his life back in order and reconcile with his estranged daughter. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Ben Vereen, Jena Malone and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A series of devastating personal traumas leave a woman feeling self-destructive and lost. After spending years behaving recklessly, she decides to turn things around by embarking on an epic, solo trek along America's 1,000-mile-long Pacific Crest Trail, which gives her the time and space to reassess her existence. Drama based on a true story, starring Reese Witherspoon and Laura Dern.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced New York Times reporter discovers that an accused killer has assumed his identity, and the resulting investigation turns into a game of cat and mouse. Fact-based drama, starring Jonah Hill, James Franco and Felicity Jones.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: A cop infiltrates the inner circle of a feared Boston mobster, unaware a fellow officer is already an informant on the gangster's payroll. When both the crooks and the police discover they have a mole in their ranks, the two detectives realise they are in sudden danger and try to expose each other. Martin Scorsese's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg, Martin Sheen and Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: A gambler takes over the running of a Las Vegas casino in the 1970s. His success is threatened by the arrival of an unstable old friend, now a powerful and ambitious mobster, an investigation by the FBI and his own wife's tortured past. Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Joe Pesci, Sharon Stone and James Woods.(n)

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A hitman takes the chance to combine his latest assassination job with a trip back to his home town for a school reunion. The occasion starts to get complicated when an old flame turns up and rekindles their lost romance - while a rival killer harasses him to join an assassins' union. Black comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack and Alan Arkin.(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.(n)

programme.title: The Hour of the Lynx
programme.desc: A disturbed young man committed to a psychiatric ward after murdering a couple tries to kill himself while ranting about God. A scientist aiding his treatment seeks the help of a priest in uncovering the roots of his psychosis, a process complicated by the clash of their personal ideologies. Drama, starring Sofie Grabol and Soren Malling. In Danish and Swedish.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after being convicted of committing cyber crimes. He's immediately enlisted by the FBI when they discover that one of his software codes is being used as part of a terrorist plot. Crime drama, starring Chris Hemsworth, Leehom Wang and Viola Davis.(n)

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: Bandits attack a Texas ranch and kidnap a boy, demanding a $1million ransom. However, they have reckoned without the intervention of the youngster's tough grandfather, who sets out on the trail with the aid of his two sons, a cunning tracker and his faithful dog. Western, starring John Wayne, Richard Boone, Maureen O'Hara, Chris Mitchum and Patrick Wayne.(n)

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth.(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: The Wind Rises
programme.desc: Hayao Miyazaki's animated biopic of Japanese aviation engineer Jiro Horikoshi. Unable to fulfil his dream of becoming a pilot, Horikoshi becomes an innovative designer of aircraft in the 1920s, living through some of the most turbulent times in the country's history. To his horror, his creations are put to destructive use in the Second World War. With the voices of Hideaki Anno and Miori Takimoto. In Japanese, German, French and English.

programme.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
programme.desc: Settlers find the dream of starting a new life in a remote valley threatened when the American War of Independence breaks out. They soon come under threat both from British forces and a Mohawk tribe angry at intruders in its territory. John Ford's historical drama, starring Henry Fonda and Claudette Colbert.

programme.title: The Lawless Breed
programme.desc: A gunslinger newly released from prison tells the story of his eventful life to a newspaper reporter in the hope of salvaging his brutal reputation. Fact-based Western, starring Rock Hudson and Julie Adams.

programme.title: The Battle at Apache Pass
programme.desc: Apache chief Cochise resolves to make a treaty allowing his people to live in peace with white settlers. However, his hot-headed fellow leader Geronimo disagrees, and puts the negotiations at risk by embarking on a murder spree, incurring the wrath of his enemies. Western, with John Lund, Jeff Chandler and Susan Cabot.

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: A luxury cruise liner at sea on New Year's Eve is struck by a freak tidal wave, which leaves it capsized and several passengers and crew trapped. A rebellious priest realises the ship is sinking fast, and leads a band of survivors up through the vessel in search of a way to the surface. Disaster movie, starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Leslie Nielsen and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller directed by the late Curtis Hanson, with Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn and Joseph Mazzello.

programme.title: East Is East
programme.desc: Pakistani chip shop owner George Khan tries to keep his seven unruly children under control in 1970s Salford. Revelling in the pleasures of adolescence, the flares-wearing youngsters seem determined to ignore his moral advice - but a shock is in store for two of his teenage sons in the shape of arranged marriages. Comedy drama, starring Om Puri, Linda Bassett, Jimi Mistry and Archie Panjabi.

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: An ambitious district attorney takes on what he believes to be an open-and-shut case - prosecuting a wealthy man who has confessed to shooting his wife, leaving her in a coma. But when the defendant arranges to represent himself in court, he proceeds to meticulously tear apart the evidence against him. Thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins and Ryan Gosling.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A book editor becomes a tenant in a technologically advanced New York apartment block and has an affair with the owner, unaware he is spying on all the residents with hidden cameras. She also discovers several women living in the building have been murdered and that the killer may be one of her neighbours. Erotic thriller, starring Sharon Stone, William Baldwin, Tom Berenger and Martin Landau.

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Veteran officer Robert Sharkey is recruited to train a team of intelligence service agents. When one of them turns out to be a German mole, Sharkey feeds him misinformation to take back to the Gestapo. However, the rogue spy outsmarts his peers and murders an agent. Without time to recruit a replacement, Sharkey steps in to head a dangerous mission in the heart of Nazi-occupied France. Second World War thriller, with James Cagney, Richard Conte, Walter Abel, Frank Latimore and Annabella.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron.

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: An aristocratic 19th-century swordsman returns to his native California from Spain to find the people living under the rule of a cruel tyrant. He adopts the guise of a masked avenger, fighting to protect the poor and downtrodden, while playing the foppish nobleman in his day-to-day life to avoid suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, with Tyrone Power and Basil Rathbone.

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the foreign legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A principled working-class woman and a selfish wealthy man meet the day they graduate from university, beginning a friendship that becomes a pivotal part of their lives. The changes they go through over the next 20 years are shown through the anniversaries of the day they first met. Romantic drama based on David Nicholls' book, with Anne Hathaway and Jim Sturgess.

programme.title: Stonehearst Asylum
programme.desc: Premiere. A new apprentice at a lunatic asylum is intrigued by the unusual methods of the doctor in charge. He realises too late that the doctor is actually a patient who has taken over with the intent of establishing his own form of society - a plan that leads to chaos. Gothic horror based on Edgar Allen Poe's short story Eliza Graves, starring Kate Beckinsale, Jim Sturgess, David Thewlis and Michael Caine.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: A Mayan tribesman is captured by enemy warriors and taken to their city to be offered as a human sacrifice. However, he makes a desperate escape and plunges into the jungle in a fraught bid to free his pregnant wife and children from an underground cave. Meanwhile, his captors pursue him and there are omens of impending doom all around. Mel Gibson's historical adventure, with Rudy Youngblood and Dalia Hernandez. In Yucatec Maya.

programme.title: The Warrior
programme.desc: A warrior vows to give up his violent ways after a crisis of conscience, but his master is left fuming at this unexpected change of heart, and sends hired killers to exact a suitably bloody revenge. A trek through the Himalayas ensues, as the former champion sets out to find inner peace - with his pursuers hot on his tail. Historical drama, starring Irfan Khan, Puru Chhibber and Sheikh Annuddin. In Hindi.(n)

programme.title: The River's Edge
programme.desc: A fugitive bank robber tracks down his former lover and her new husband, forcing them to help him escape across the border to Mexico with his ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller, starring Ray Milland, Anthony Quinn, Debra Paget and Harry Carey Jr.(n)

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: A hard-working, small-town businessman comes to think his life has been a complete waste of time and tries to commit suicide. At the last minute, his guardian angel pays him a visit and makes him realise his true worth by showing him what would have happened to those around him had he never been born. Fantasy drama, starring James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Henry Travers, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell and Frank Faylen.(n)

programme.title: Forty Guns
programme.desc: A despotic Arizona landowner, who uses a band of hired gunmen to dominate her territory, becomes attracted to a determined US marshal sent to restore order. The lawman has renounced violence, but when tragedy strikes on the day of his wedding, he takes up arms once again. Western, starring Barbara Stanwyck, with Barry O'Sullivan and Dean Jagger.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: An egocentric professor leads an expedition on a journey into the Amazon on a mission to prove his theory that dinosaurs still survive there. On arrival, they find the prehistoric beasts are all too real - and only one of the dangers they face. Fantasy adventure, based on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel, starring Claude Rains, Michael Rennie and Jill St John.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: A military robot is struck by lightning and develops a mind of its own. The machine embarks on a series of comic misadventures, but the company that made him want him back. He realises his only hope is to convince the scientist who invented him that he really is alive. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Steve Guttenberg, Ally Sheedy and Fisher Stevens.(n)

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four American soldiers are sent on a mission into the mountains of Afghanistan to track down and eliminate a high-ranking terrorist leader. They soon find themselves faced with a terrible moral dilemma and a battle for survival against overwhelming odds. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: The American government responds to rising crime rates by introducing an annual 12-hour period when all laws are suspended, so the people can get violent impulses out of their system. A family takes shelter at home, but when a stranger turns up asking for help, the mayhem outside soon catches up with them. Horror, starring Lena Headey and Ethan Hawke.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy must stand in for the town minister while he is away on honeymoon, but fears he has nothing profound to say.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura returns Almanzo's ring but his sister Eliza comes up with a cunning rescue plan. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Trying to start a new life after Alice's death, Jonathan and his son Andy move to Sleepy Eye to establish a freight business.

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy must stand in for the town minister while he is away on honeymoon, but fears he has nothing profound to say.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Edwards is responsible for bringing a deadly fever to Walnut Grove, resulting in the terrified citizens being placed in quarantine to prevent further spread.

programme.title: The Audrey Hepburn Story
programme.desc: Concluding the biopic of the glamorous Hollywood star, with Jennifer Love Hewitt as the sophisticated actress who took America by storm in the 1950s and 1960s thanks to roles in Funny Face, Breakfast at Tiffanys and My Fair Lady. With Frances Fisher and Eric McCormack.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: Engaging espionage adventure about a suave and courageous Navy officer assigned to pose as his own double - a renowned counterfeiter - in an effort to expose a gang of ruthless crooks. But his daring leaves him in trouble when he discovers he's under suspicion of double-dealing from all sides. Michael Craig, Julia Arnall and Brenda de Banzie star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. However, when he does not take kindly to her following him, she disappears again and is left up to John-Boy to find her. Meanwhile, the rest of the family works hard picking apples to save enough money to send her on a trip to Washington to cure her wanderlust.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Ingalls family is delighted by the birth of a new baby boy, Charles Fredrick. Laura becomes jealous and refuses to pray for her new brother's good health. The young boy dies soon afterwards and she is racked with guilt.

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.

programme.title: Held Hostage
programme.desc: A bank manager and her daughter are kidnapped by three masked men, who tape explosives to them. The terrified mother is ordered to rob her own bank or the bombs will be set off. She manages to inform a colleague of her predicament, only to end up accused of being a willing accomplice. Thriller, starring Julie Benz and Brendan Perry.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Jardine and the team investigate a series of mysterious deaths among members of a tango club, and uncover a connection with an unsolved robbery. Meanwhile, as Reid's wedding approaches, Ross tries to convince her that she is rushing into marriage too quickly.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama. A couple search for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Kevin Dillon, Edward Asner and Dixie Carter.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is given extra tuition by a 16-year-old genius, and in return, provides the gifted youngster with a taste of the family life he has never experienced.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A boxer comes to work on the mountain, hoping to raise the money to build a church. However, when he gets the chance to enter a match, he learns it is rigged.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A former football star agrees to take on the role of the town's team coach, but the squad reacts poorly to his tough brand of leadership.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: An old man takes in two orphans running from care workers who have decided they stand a better chance of finding a family if they are split up and offered for adoption separately.

programme.title: Our Gift of Love
programme.desc: A freak accident leaves a man in a coma shortly before Christmas. While friends and family urge his wife to prepare for the worst, she refuses to accept he will not recover and dedicates herself to taking care of him. Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is given extra tuition by a 16-year-old genius, and in return, provides the gifted youngster with a taste of the family life he has never experienced.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children decide to treat the community to a play, but Nellie ends up with all the best lines.

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.

programme.title: Deep in My Heart
programme.desc: A white woman gives birth to a black baby following a sexual assault and resolves to give it away to foster care. However, after initially being placed in a loving home, the child is sent to live with a well-meaning but unsuitable family. Fact-based drama, starring Anne Bancroft, Lynn Whitfield, Alice Krige and Cara Buono.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A famous film star is stranded on the mountain when her car breaks down and is invited to stay with the Waltons, putting on a one-woman show to raise her train fare back to the city. While she charms most of the family, Olivia is not convinced by her tall tales. Pippa Scott and Dorothy Neuman guest star.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The arrival of Christmas prompts everyone to become secretive. Laura wants to buy something expensive for her mother and has to come up with a way to pay for it.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: A couple take in a foster child, and hope to be able to adopt her. However, the authorities return her to her father, whom the girl claims has been abusing her. The devoted foster family begins a legal battle to regain custody. Fact-based drama, starring Tess Harper, Frederic Forrest and Patricia Kalember.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.

programme.title: Crimes of Passion: Victim of Love
programme.desc: A sinister killer marries then murders a naive woman, prompting her parents to begin a relentless fight to bring him to justice. Fact-based drama, with Dwight Schultz, Bonnie Bartlett, Andy Romano and Dennis Boutsikaris.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A female doctor working at a women's health clinic is badly injured in a shotgun blast intended for a colleague, so Burke arranges protection for the intended victim - only for the killer to finish the job he started on the first medic as she recovers in hospital. The team waste no time in pointing the finger of blame at an anti-abortion group who have been targeting the centre, but they believe in the sanctity of life - so why would they commit murder? Feature-length episode, starring Alex Norton, Blythe Duff, John Michie and Colin McCredie.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is nervous about attending a high-school reunion, feeling that his friends have all achieved more than he has.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy shows a reporter writing a guide book around the community, but John worries about what he might uncover.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Annie Crane's mother finally tracks her daughter down and sparks begin to fly, until Caroline intervenes.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After having a domestic squabble, Laura suspects that Almanzo is having an affair with a former girlfriend and decides to leave him and move back to her parents' home.(n)

programme.title: The Price of a Broken Heart
programme.desc: A woman learns her husband has been having an affair with his secretary for years and plans to abandon his family for her. The spurned wife responds by suing her husband's lover for $1million under a long-forgotten state law - resulting in a case that has far-reaching consequences for American divorce law. Fact-based drama, starring Laura Innes, Park Overall and Timothy Carhart.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A boxer comes to work on the mountain, hoping to raise the money to build a church. However, when he gets the chance to enter a match, he learns it is rigged.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A boy whose father was a Native American warrior faces prejudice from his own grandfather, so the locals step in to help. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Coco Chanel
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama telling the story how unassuming French seamstress Coco Chanel rose to become one the most influential fashion designers of the 20th Century. This first part follows the young Coco through her childhood as an orphan to her early days as a dressmaker's assistant. Shirley MacLaine and Malcolm McDowell star.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A girl befriended by the family is shocked to learn her drunken father was responsible for burning down the school to prevent Miss Hunter teaching the theory of evolution.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson storms out after an argument with Harriet. Their neighbours fear they will divorce, and try to get them to reconcile.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Ashley Home
programme.desc: Premiere. When Libba Phillips' troubled younger sister Ashley suddenly goes missing, she sets out to locate her sibling and bring her home. As the years go by, Libba's resolve remains true, at the expense of her marriage and her career. However, personal loss does not deter her from the mission, and she finds a new calling in life creating a resource centre for the families of other people who have falled through the cracks. Drama, based on a true story, starring AJ Cook.(n)

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen.(n)

programme.title: Escape from Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with the man she believes is Mr Right and hastily marries him, but it isn't long before he begins showing his true colours, forcing her to seek shelter at a safe house. Fact-based drama, starring Maria Pitillo, Adam Storke and Brad Dourif.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A taxi driver is found murdered in his cab outside a jeweller's, leading Burke and Fraser to investigate the shop's owner and his family, who deny all knowledge of the deceased. Meanwhile, Ross and Reid discover a link between the dead man and a powerful underworld figure, and suspicion begins to fall on a shady lawyer with political ambitions. Blythe Duff and John Michie star.(n)

programme.title: Aftermath: A Long Way Home
programme.desc: A traumatised family struggle to come to terms with the lingering spectre of sexual abuse as they attempt reconciliation. Drama, starring Meredith Baxter and Robert Urich.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as a hard-bitten Navy S.E.A.L, who is sent into the heart of Africa and finds himself in conflict when he has to choose between following orders or the dictates of his conscience

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse for a group of friends when they visit a remote archaeological dig in the jungle and are quickly entangled in a brutal struggle for survival against the evils hidden within. Stars Jena Malone

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare

programme.title: Bernie

programme.desc: James Mason as a British Naval officer trailing Nazi agents in wartime England. Laura: Joyce Howard. Child: Tom Walls. Mansell: Edward Rigby. Lippinscott: David Farrar. Lily: Phyllis Stanley. Vintage spy yarn. Karel Lamac directed

programme.title: MGM Is on the Move!
programme.desc: Clips from MGM releases for 1964. (cc)

programme.desc: 1870s San Francisco is under financial threat due to the ups-and-downs in the mining stock market, and a wealthy businessman has to decide if he wants to give back to society

programme.title: Lightning Strikes Twice
programme.desc: A Texas rancher acquitted of his wife's murder by one juror's vote falls in love with an actress, and a complex web of jealousy and attraction ensues

programme.title: The Scarf
programme.desc: A young man (John Ireland) escapes from an asylum to prove himself innocent of murder and is aided by a waitress (Mercedes McCambridge). Emlyn Williams, James Barton, Lloyd Gough. Good cast. E.A. Dupont directed

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Best Picture based on the Edna Ferber bestseller about Texas cattlemen, oil, troubled romances and racial injustice chronicles the lives of one proud family from the 1930s to the '50s. James Dean's final film; George Stevens won a Best Director Oscar

programme.title: Cimarron
programme.desc: Frontier epic based on Edna Ferber's best seller covers the years 1890 to 1915 and chronicles how an impulsive and short-fused cowboy and his savvy immigrant wife were instrumental in the settling of the Oklahoma territory

programme.title: Angel Baby
programme.desc: Offbeat story about a mute girl (Salome Jens) exploited by evangelists. Mercedes McCambridge, George Hamilton. Mollie: Joan Blondell. Hoke: Burt Reynolds (his film debut). Ben: Henry Jones. Well directed by Paul Wendkos

programme.title: MGM 40th Anniversary
programme.desc: A 1964 celebration of the film studio's 40 years in the business

programme.title: Caged

programme.title: House of Women
programme.desc: A chronicle of unwholesome conditions in a women's prison, where a pregnant woman is wrongly convicted of armed robbery and sentenced to serve five years, during which the warden becomes attracted to her

programme.title: Ladies They Talk About
programme.desc: A female bank robber becomes boss of her cell block in San Quentin after a heist gone wrong lands her in prison

programme.desc: About inmates of a women's prison and how one (Sally Eilers) is redeemed by the love of a doctor (Louis Hayward). Anne Shirley, Esther Dale, Lee Patrick, Leona Roberts, George Irving, Richard Bond, Netta Packer, Rita La Roy. Directed by Lew Landers

programme.title: So Young, So Bad
programme.desc: Paul Henreid, as a psychiatrist, tries to correct conditions in a wayward-girls home. Catherine McLeod, Anne Francis. Dolores: Rosita (Rita) Moreno. Filmed in New York. Unoriginal. Bernard Vorhaus directed

programme.title: Riot in Juvenile Prison
programme.desc: Contrived yarn about scandal, near-rape and brutal conditions in a coeducational reform school. Furman: Jerome Thor. Eddie: Scott Marlowe. Walton: John Hoyt. Grace: Marcia Henderson. Jacques: Morgan Wallace. Mother Frochard: Lucille La Verne. Robespierre: Sidney Herbert. Pierre: Sheldon Lewis. D.W. Griffith directed

programme.title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
